codes.AROI: Document is a payment that applies to a specific source document.
codes.CMCN: Document is an agreement between the parties, stipulating the terms and conditions of the delivery of goods or services.
codes.CNFA: Document is a credit note for the final amount settled for a commercial transaction.
codes.CONT: Document is a contract evidencing an agreement between the seller and buyer for the supply of goods and/or services.
codes.DISP: Document is an advice of dispatch of the goods.
codes.DNFA: Document is a debit note for the final amount settled for a commercial transaction.
codes.HIRI: Document is an invoice for the hiring of human resources or renting goods or equipment.
codes.MSIN: Document is an invoice claiming payment for the supply of metered services, eg. Gas or electricity, supplied to a fixed meter.
codes.PROF: In trade transactions, a pro forma invoice is a document that states a commitment from the seller to sell goods to the buyer at specified prices and terms. It is used to declare the value of the trade. It is not a true invoice, because it is not used to record accounts receivable for the seller and accounts payable for the buyer.
codes.QUOT: Document is a quotation setting out the conditions under which the goods and/or services are offered.
codes.SBIN: Document is a statement of the transactions posted to the debtor's account at the supplier.
codes.SOAC: Document is a statement of the transactions posted to the debtor's account at the supplier.
codes.SPRR: Document is a document presented by the seller in support of the procurement of goods and/or services.
codes.TISH: Document is a timesheet recording times for the provision of services and/or delivery of goods.
codes.TSUT: Document is a transaction identifier as assigned by the Trade Services Utility.
codes.USAR: Document is a usage report indicating the consumption pattern for designated goods and/or services.
codes.VCHR: Document is an electronic payment document.

description: Specifies the document type as published in an external document type code list.
name: ExternalDocumentType1Code
